description: Defines a Flutter widget 'SettingsSheet' which shows a bottom sheet with language selection and notification toggle options. It includes internal state management for user preferences within the widget.

classes.name: SettingsSheet
classes.description: Public widget class representing a settings bottom sheet with language and notification toggles.

classes.name: _SettingsSheetState
classes.description: State class managing the internal state and UI construction for 'SettingsSheet'.

classes.name: _LanguagePicker
classes.description: Private stateless widget providing a list of language options for user selection.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state object for 'SettingsSheet'.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for 'SettingsSheet', rendering UI components.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for '_LanguagePicker', rendering the language options list.
